entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
